https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/c: a detailed close-up captures a rectangular bas relief sculpture, set against a backdrop of gray marble. the bas relief features a man and woman embracing, with a child lying on the ground in front of them. the woman's hand is extended towards the child, while the man's arm is outstretched towards the woman. the woman's face is obscured by her hair, but her eyes are visible, and she is holding a flower in her right hand. the child is lying on the ground, his head tilted to the left, and he is holding a flower in his right hand. the background is a blend of gray and white marble, with a thin strip of light gray running vertically down the center of the frame.

a close up view of a bas relief sculpture on the side of a building. the bas relief is a man laying down with his hands out and a woman lying next to him. the man is holding a sword in his right hand and a shield in his left hand. the woman is holding her hands out to the sides and is laying down with her head facing the viewer. the background is a light gray color. the bas relief is surrounded by a brown frame that has a white border around it.

a detailed close-up captures a rectangular relief carving on the facade of a building. the relief, featuring a man and woman in a seated pose, is set against a backdrop of a rocky landscape. the man's head is adorned with a crown, while his hands are outstretched towards the viewer. the woman, also seated, is positioned to her right, her arms outstretched towards the viewer. the background features a rocky landscape, punctuated by a few trees and shrubs.
